data.text:
Knock 'em Down

Jay agrees to sub in on Camâs bowling team for the finals but Cam was not fully upfront about it being an all gay league, which puts Jay in a precarious position. Phil and Claire have a surprisingly good time with unlikely dinner companions, their neighbors Ronnie and Amber, and Gloria and Mitch agree to go clubbing with Haley to prove theyâre still young and fun but they didnât anticipate the pre-party portion of the night.

Finding Fizbo

An online video sets Cam on a quest to restore Fizbo's good name. Meanwhile, Phil's in for a surprise when he meets his future step-brother.
